author: desruisseaux
msg: Simplified a little bit the API of Logging utility methods,
use a single logger for all org.apache.sis.metadata.iso.* packages,
share the same TestWatcher class in test cases instead than repeating @Before and @After methods.

author: hdu
msg: Create branch rejuvenate01 for a platform refresh
- support for XCode4 and its SDKs
- support for a TR1 compatible STL
- prepare to drop stlport for the platform's native STLs
- replace functionality deprecated in XCode4's SDKs (OSX>=10.7)
- support for building with C++11 mode enabled

author: chirino
msg: Implements AMQ-4526: ActiveMQ should automatically restart if a Locker looses it's lock.
* Adds a new broker config option 'restartAllowed'.  Set it to false to revert to the preserve behavior.
* Adds a new 'restart' JMX operation on the broker
* The default IO exception handler will trigger a broker restart instead of a broker stop.
